alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 8:31PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bonner, northwestern Shoshone and northeastern Kootenai Counties through 800 PM PDT... At 729 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hayden Lake, or near Dalton Gardens, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Patchy blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. A 38 mph wind gust was reported at Coeur d`Alene Airport at 715 pm. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Brief reductions in visibility are possible. Locations impacted include... Hayden, Dalton Gardens, Athol, Hayden Lake and Chilco. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 24 and 25. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 435 and 454. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
